trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZJ014_03577_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Saushs Koal appears to be staring rather intently at your mouth...
TEXT_LUCKZJ014_03577_TODO_00<tab>Use the stout rope on weakened sea creatures.
TEXT_LUCKZJ014_03577_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the captured sea creatures to Saushs Koal.
TEXT_LUCKZJ014_03577_SAUSHSKOAL_000_000<tab>Finlessh one, finlessh one! How am I to glide through the watersh wishout watersh!? Or ssseek out that whish I crave? I cannot!
TEXT_LUCKZJ014_03577_SAUSHSKOAL_000_001<tab>And what do I crave, you wonder? Teetsh! The teetsh of myriad beastshs!
TEXT_LUCKZJ014_03577_SAUSHSKOAL_000_002<tab>Find for me feishty beastshs wish good teetshs, shmack them about until they're good and weak, and then bind them wish thish rope and bring them to me!
TEXT_LUCKZJ014_03577_SAUSHSKOAL_000_003<tab>Let me shee, let me shink...a mnyiri, a morgawr, and a deep-shea leech. Bring me one of eacsh, alive─and mind the teetsh!
TEXT_LUCKZJ014_03577_SAUSHSKOAL_000_005<tab>Remember: a mnyiri, a morgawr, and a deep-shea leech! Alive, if you would, and wish their lovely teetsh shtill intact!
TEXT_LUCKZJ014_03577_SAUSHSKOAL_000_010<tab>Ahh, my finlessh friend! Have you my living loveliesh?
TEXT_LUCKZJ014_03577_SAUSHSKOAL_000_011<tab>Shhhplendid! Shhhplendid! What big nashty teetsh you have! And now they are mine, mwahahaha! All mine!
TEXT_LUCKZJ014_03577_SAUSHSKOAL_000_012<tab>Teetsh make for fine ssspearheadsh, and still finer gifts for female Ondo. The clutchmother and her attendants all delight in wearing sucsh jewelry.
TEXT_LUCKZJ014_03577_SAUSHSKOAL_000_013<tab>But trutsh be told, I shimply adore teetsh of all shapsh and shizes. I am a collector wish an inshhhatiable need.
TEXT_LUCKZJ014_03577_SAUSHSKOAL_000_014<tab>Why, the other day, I ashked another Ondo to give me his. Jusht a few! I even offered to pull them myshelf. But he grew so angry and refushed!

TEXT_LUCKZJ014_03577_SAUSHSKOAL_000_015<tab>Shaaay... Your teetsh are rather nishe, finlessh one. Round and shhhiny and shmall. Would you be sho kind ash to favor me wish a few? The pulling will be quick and painlessh, I promish!
TEXT_LUCKZJ014_03577_SAUSHSKOAL_000_016<tab>No? A shame. If you change your mind, come and find me. I shall be waiting. Always waiting, heh heh heh...
